questions.question: Considering the overall visual layout, what is the dominant color scheme of the presented nutrition facts?

Looking at the compositional structure, what is the primary organizational mode for presenting the nutritional information?
From the nutritional breakdown, what is the total amount of grams of fat contained within a single serving?
Considering the layout, what is the specified measurement unit for the serving size of the item in question?
Analyzing the textual content, what is the quantity of servings available in the food container being described?
